original_title: 逆NTR [驚愕] 親友（淫乱美乳）に夫を奪われた私 通野未帆
overview: I never thought that my husband would be robbed by my best friend who was on good terms with me since college. Miho and I are best friends from college. I thought he was someone I could talk to and talk about anything with. It's true that her husband and Miho have been dating longer, and Miho was the one who introduced me to her husband. But why? She invited Miho and the others to her home for the first time in a while and they had a great time. A secret from her drunken husbands, she vented her husband's complaints to Miho. She thought it was a good stress reliever for her, but Miho didn't think so. Her best friend's husband asks her about her work and eats and tipsy Miho invites her husband to her home. She drunkenly talks about her past, saying that she liked herself, that I liked you too . Her best friend didn't know Miho's true form. She is sexually sloppy and ends up wanting someone else's man. Her husband who is gradually falling into Miho.
title: Reverse NTR My Best Friend Fucked My Husband
